Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Recharge \Re*charge"\ (r[=e]*ch[aum]rj"), v. t. & i. [Pref. re- + charge: cf. F. recharger.] 1. To charge or accuse in return. [1913 Webster]
2. To attack again; to attack anew. --Dryden. [1913 Webster]
recharge v 1: load anew with ammunition, "She reloaded the gun carefully" [syn: {reload}] 2: charge anew; "recharge a battery"
